Grocer Vollodos: We have a few surviving Dark Elves are now developing drugs. But I'm not a scientist and not a magician, so little I can do ... All I can - extract materials necessary for the investigation, killing monsters that live nearby. My own strength is not enough to fight monsters, so I appeal help from strangers passing by.
